definition: Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: KNEEL】She knelt down to pull weeds from the flower bed.
sentences.chinese: 他跪下拔去花坛中的杂草。

sentences.english: Scarlet Sage is one of the most important terrace flower.
sentences.chinese: 一串红是目前最主要的一种花坛花卉。

sentences.english: She came across butchered hedges and flowerbeds choked with weeds.
sentences.chinese: 她发现树篱被糟蹋，花坛里野草丛生。

sentences.english: The parterres will stay until the National Day on October 1.
sentences.chinese: 今年广场花坛摆放将一直延续到国庆节后。

sentences.english: You'll catch it if Mrs Brown finds you trampling on her flowers beds.
sentences.chinese: 如果布朗太太发现你踩她的花坛，你会挨一顿痛骂。

sentences.english: The flowerbeds brim with a mixture of lilies and roses.
sentences.chinese: 花坛里长满了百合和玫瑰。

sentences.english: You u'll catch it, when your father finds you've been trampling over the flower beds.
sentences.chinese: 要是你父亲发现你踩过花坛，你会挨揍的。

sentences.english: Please take the flower-bed as the background。
There was a flower border beneath the wall.
The dog rushed straight through the flowerbed .
The washing was still Dorothy's responsibility, and the garden work and the flower beds.
sentences.chinese: 洗洗刷刷仍是多萝西的事，还有整理园子和花坛的活。

sentences.english: She knelt down to pull weeds from the flower bed.
sentences.chinese: 他跪下拔去花坛中的杂草。

sentences.english: If you let your dog dig up my flower bed again, I'll have the law on you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你再让你的狗挖掉我的花坛，我将去请警察了。

sentences.english: A raised flowerbed can be built by laying wood in a square and filling it with compost.
sentences.chinese: 凸起的花坛可以通过铺设在填方木和堆肥它建成。

sentences.english: The sculpture stands in the centre of the flower terrace.
sentences.chinese: 塑像坐落于花坛的中央。

sentences.english: How many pieces of the flower bed next to the Indus, Dandan land stands, his mouth a bit deserted.
sentences.chinese: 花坛旁的几颗梧桐，眈眈地矗立着，含着几分冷清。
